item.title: Hedosophia leads $7M seed round into retail supply chain AI startup Ameba

item.dc:creator: Romain Dillet
item.description:

This relatively new investor in the French tech ecosystem is the family office of the Houzé family — the owners of upmarket fashion retailer the Galeries Lafayette Group. item.title: Peak XV trims fund size and fees as Indian market overheats
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Peak XV, the largest India and Southeast Asia-focused venture firm, is reducing the size of a handful of its funds and lowering fees as it seeks to become “deeply aligned” with its limited partners. item.description:

item.title: A hidden microphone on a San Francisco street pole is spotting ‘bops’ in the wild
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
In San Francisco’s Mission district, good music is all around you. That’s why, high up on a street pole at an undisclosed location in the Mission, Riley Walz installed a solar-powered box containing an old Android phone running the song identifying service, Shazam, 24 hours a day, seven days a week. The so called “Bop […]

item.title: Threads users can now see who follows them from other fediverse servers
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
Instagram head Adam Mosseri announced on Tuesday that users who have connected their accounts to the fediverse, also known as the open social web, can now see who follows them and likes their posts from other fediverse servers, such as Mastodon and Pixelfed.  The company said users will now have up to 15 minutes to make […]

item.title: Anthropic hires OpenAI co-founder Durk Kingma
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Durk Kingma, one of the lesser-known co-founders of OpenAI, today announced that he’ll be joining Anthropic. In a series of posts on X, Kingma revealed that he’ll be working mostly remotely, from the Netherlands (where he’s based), but didn’t say which Anthropic org he’ll be joining — or leading. Reached for comment, an Anthropic spokesperson […]

item.title: Direct ocean capture may be the next frontier for carbon removal
item.dc:creator: Mike Butcher
item.description:

item.description:

item.description:
